name: homebridge-androidtv
description: Homebridge plugin to control your AndroidTV / Freebox Player Pop / Freemox Mini 4k

scripts.babel: babel ./src/*.* --out-dir dist --delete-dir-on-start -D && babel ./src/homebridge/*.* --out-dir dist/homebridge -D && babel ./src/homebridge/admin/*.* --out-dir dist/homebridge/admin -D && babel ./src/homebridge/admin/static/*.* --out-dir dist/homebridge/admin/static -D

author: @louis49
